ProjectTitle: Exploring the role of mechanical forces on human cortex development using organoid models
InitialFeedbackHistory:
25/05/2023
Data: Human cells including cell lines are also considered human bodily material, please register these at the UZL ethics committee, for more information and forms see: https://research.kuleuven.be/en/associatienet/ethics/guidance/humanmaterial
Documentation: How will you document your data, will you use (electronic) notebooks, protocols etc? Which metadata standard(s) will you use? for more information see: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata
Sharing: for microscopy you can also consider using a disciplinary repository such as bioimage-archive (www.ebi.ac.uk/bioimage-archive) or image data resource (https://idr.openmicroscopy.org/) another alternative is KU Leuven RDR: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
